mapper.sql: ID, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_TYPE, APP_ID, WORKGROUND, MENU_GROUP, MENU_TITLE, URL, DISABLED, DISPLAY, PERMISSION, TARGET, MENU_ORDER, IDENTITY, PARENT_ID, PARENT_IDS, ICON, WEIGHT
mapper.select: select ID, PARENT_ID as pId,RESOURCE_NAME as name,TARGET from t_site_resource
mapper.insert: insert into t_site_resource (ID, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_TYPE, APP_ID, WORKGROUND, MENU_GROUP, MENU_TITLE, URL, DISABLED, DISPLAY, PERMISSION, TARGET, MENU_ORDER, IDENTITY, PARENT_ID, PARENT_IDS, ICON, WEIGHT, ADDON) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workground,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{display,jdbcType=BIT}, #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addon,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_site_resource
RESOURCE_NAME = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOURCE_TYPE = #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORKGROUND = #{workground,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MENU_GROUP = #{menuGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MENU_TITLE = #{menuTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISABLED = #{disabled,jdbcType=BIT},
DISPLAY = #{display,jdbcType=BIT},
PERMISSION = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TARGET = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MENU_ORDER = #{menuOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IDENTITY = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PARENT_IDS = #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADDON = #{addon,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_site_resource set RESOURCE_NAME = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESOURCE_TYPE = #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORKGROUND = #{workground,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_GROUP = #{menuGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_TITLE = #{menuTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISABLED = #{disabled,jdbcType=BIT}, DISPLAY = #{display,jdbcType=BIT}, PERMISSION = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TARGET = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_ORDER = #{menuOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IDENTITY = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PARENT_IDS = #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADDON = #{addon,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_site_resource set RESOURCE_NAME = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESOURCE_TYPE = #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORKGROUND = #{workground,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_GROUP = #{menuGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_TITLE = #{menuTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISABLED = #{disabled,jdbcType=BIT}, DISPLAY = #{display,jdbcType=BIT}, PERMISSION = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TARGET = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_ORDER = #{menuOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IDENTITY = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PARENT_IDS = #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT t_site_resource.ID, t_site_resource.RESOURCE_NAME, t_site_resource.RESOURCE_TYPE, t_site_resource.APP_ID, t_site_resource.WORKGROUND, t_site_resource.MENU_GROUP, t_site_resource.MENU_TITLE, t_site_resource.URL, t_site_resource.DISABLED, t_site_resource.DISPLAY, t_site_resource.PERMISSION, t_site_resource.ADDON, t_site_resource.TARGET, t_site_resource.MENU_ORDER, t_site_resource.IDENTITY, t_site_resource.PARENT_ID, t_site_resource.PARENT_IDS, t_site_resource.ICON, t_site_resource.WEIGHT FROM t_site_resource JOIN t_site_resource_role ON t_site_resource.ID = t_site_resource_role.resource_id JOIN t_site_roles ON t_site_resource_role.ROLE_ID = t_site_roles.role_id JOIN t_business_storemember ON t_site_roles.role_id = t_business_storemember.role_id JOIN t_members ON t_business_storemember.member_id = t_members.MEMBER_ID JOIN t_pam_account ON t_members.ACCOUNT_ID = t_pam_account.ACCOUNT_ID where t_site_resource.DISABLEd = 0 and t_business_storemember.disabled='0' and t_site_resource.DISPLAY=0 and t_site_resource.PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and t_pam_account.ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT t_site_resource.ID, t_site_resource.RESOURCE_NAME, t_site_resource.RESOURCE_TYPE, t_site_resource.APP_ID, t_site_resource.WORKGROUND, t_site_resource.MENU_GROUP, t_site_resource.MENU_TITLE, t_site_resource.URL, t_site_resource.DISABLED, t_site_resource.DISPLAY, t_site_resource.PERMISSION, t_site_resource.ADDON, t_site_resource.TARGET, t_site_resource.MENU_ORDER, t_site_resource.IDENTITY, t_site_resource.PARENT_ID, t_site_resource.PARENT_IDS, t_site_resource.ICON, t_site_resource.WEIGHT FROM t_site_resource JOIN t_storeroles_resource ON t_site_resource.ID = t_storeroles_resource.resource_id JOIN t_business_storeroles ON t_storeroles_resource.roles_id = t_business_storeroles.roles_id JOIN t_business_storemember ON t_business_storeroles.roles_id = t_business_storemember.role_id JOIN t_members ON t_business_storemember.member_id = t_members.MEMBER_ID JOIN t_pam_account ON t_members.ACCOUNT_ID = t_pam_account.ACCOUNT_ID where t_site_resource.DISABLEd = 0 and t_site_resource.DISPLAY=0 and t_business_storemember.disabled='0' and t_pam_account.LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT t_site_resource.ID, t_site_resource.RESOURCE_NAME, t_site_resource.RESOURCE_TYPE, t_site_resource.APP_ID, t_site_resource.WORKGROUND, t_site_resource.MENU_GROUP, t_site_resource.MENU_TITLE, t_site_resource.URL, t_site_resource.DISABLED, t_site_resource.DISPLAY, t_site_resource.PERMISSION, t_site_resource.ADDON, t_site_resource.TARGET, t_site_resource.MENU_ORDER, t_site_resource.IDENTITY, t_site_resource.PARENT_ID, t_site_resource.PARENT_IDS, t_site_resource.ICON, t_site_resource.WEIGHT FROM t_site_resource JOIN t_site_resource_role ON t_site_resource.ID = t_site_resource_role.RESOURCE_ID JOIN t_site_roles ON t_site_resource_role.role_id = t_site_roles.ROLE_ID JOIN t_business_storemember ON t_site_roles.ROLE_ID = t_business_storemember.role_id where t_site_resource.DISABLEd = 0 and t_site_resource.DISPLAY=0 and t_business_storemember.disabled='0' and t_business_storemember.commany_id=#{companyId} order by #{orderColumn}
select ID, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_TYPE, URL, DISABLEd, DISPLAY, PERMISSION, TARGET, MENU_ORDER, PARENT_ID, PARENT_IDS from t_site_resource
